languages.text: "Тогда — увидимся в порту, Ваша Светлость. Церемониймейстер найдет способ устроить процессию так, чтобы я мог разделить с вами финал торжества. А после, милостью Императора, проктор снимет с меня обвинения, и с проблемами на Райкад Минорисе будет окончательно покончено".

"Then I will see you at the starport, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The master of ceremonies will organise the procession in a way that should allow me to share the ceremony's finale with you. And after that, Emperor willing, the Proctor will clear me of all charges, and the woes of Rykad Minoris will be over at last."
languages.original_text: "Тогда — увидимся в порту, Ваша Светлость. Церемониймейстер найдет способ устроить процессию так, чтобы я мог разделить с вами финал торжества. А после, милостью Императора, проктор снимет с меня обвинения, и с проблемами на Райкад Минорисе будет окончательно покончено".

traits.locale_text: "Then I will see you at the starport, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The master of ceremonies will organise the procession in a way that would allow me share the ceremony's finale with you. And after that, Emperor willing, the Proctor will clear me of charges, and the woes of Rykad Minoris will be over at last."

"Then I will see you at the starport, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The master of ceremonies will organise the procession in a way that would allow me share the ceremony's finale with you. And after that, Emperor willing, the Proctor will clear me of charges, and the woes of Rykad Minoris will be over at last."

"Then I will see you at the starport, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The master of ceremonies will organise the procession in a way that should allow me share the ceremony's finale with you. And after that, Emperor willing, the Proctor will clear me of all charges, and the woes of Rykad Minoris will be over at last."

"Then I will see you at the starport, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The master of ceremonies will organise the procession in a way that should allow me share the ceremony's finale with you. And after that, Emperor willing, the Proctor will clear me of all charges, and the woes of Rykad Minoris will be over at last."

"Then I will see you at the starport, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The master of ceremonies will organise the procession in a way that should allow me share the ceremony's finale with you. And after that, Emperor willing, the Proctor will clear me of all charges, and the woes of Rykad Minoris will be over at last."

"Then I will see you at the starport, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The master of ceremonies will organise the procession in a way that should allow me share the ceremony's finale with you. And after that, Emperor willing, the Proctor will clear me of all charges, and the woes of Rykad Minoris will be over at last."

languages.text: "Dann sehen wir uns am Raumhafen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Der Zeremonienmeister wird die Prozession auf eine Weise organisieren, die mir ermöglichen sollte, dem Ende der Zeremonie an Eurer Seite beizuwohnen. Und danach wird mich der Proktor, so der Imperator will, von allen Anklagepunkten freisprechen, auf dass die Leiden von Rykad Minoris endlich ein Ende finden."
languages.original_text: "Then I will see you at the starport, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The master of ceremonies will organise the procession in a way that should allow me share the ceremony's finale with you. And after that, Emperor willing, the Proctor will clear me of all charges, and the woes of Rykad Minoris will be over at last."

traits.locale_text: "Dann sehen wir uns am Raumhafen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Der Zeremonienmeister wird die Prozession auf eine Weise organisieren, die mir ermöglichen sollte, dem Ende der Zeremonie an Eurer Seite beizuwohnen. Und danach wird mich der Proktor, so der Imperator will, von allen Anklagepunkten freisprechen, auf dass die Leiden von Rykad Minoris endlich ein Ende finden."

languages.text: « Alors, je vous reverrai à l'astroport, Votre Seigneurie. Le maître des cérémonies organisera la procession de façon à me permettre de partager la fin de la cérémonie avec vous. Et ensuite, si l'Empereur y consent, le proctor me déclarera innocent de toutes les accusations qui pèsent contre moi et Rykad Minoris sera enfin délivrée de ses malheurs. »
languages.original_text: "Then I will see you at the starport, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The master of ceremonies will organise the procession in a way that should allow me share the ceremony's finale with you. And after that, Emperor willing, the Proctor will clear me of all charges, and the woes of Rykad Minoris will be over at last."

traits.locale_text: « Alors, je vous reverrai à l'astroport, Votre Seigneurie. Le maître des cérémonies organisera la procession de façon à me permettre de partager la fin de la cérémonie avec vous. Et ensuite, si l'Empereur y consent, le proctor me déclarera innocent de toutes les accusations qui pèsent contre moi et Rykad Minoris sera enfin délivrée de ses malheurs. »

languages.text: «Entonces le veré en el puerto estelar, {mf|milord|milady}. El maestro de ceremonias organizará la procesión de modo que me permita compartir con usted la conclusión de la ceremonia. Y después, Emperador mediante, el Procurador me exonerará de todos los cargos y por fin habrán terminado las penurias de Rykad Minoris».
languages.original_text: "Then I will see you at the starport, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The master of ceremonies will organise the procession in a way that should allow me share the ceremony's finale with you. And after that, Emperor willing, the Proctor will clear me of all charges, and the woes of Rykad Minoris will be over at last."

traits.locale_text: «Entonces le veré en el puerto estelar, {mf|milord|milady}. El maestro de ceremonias organizará la procesión de modo que me permita compartir con usted la conclusión de la ceremonia. Y después, Emperador mediante, el Procurador me exonerará de todos los cargos y por fin habrán terminado las penurias de Rykad Minoris».

languages.text: “既然如此，我们就在星港见吧，大人。祭仪大师会组织好游行队伍，而我会在庆典即将结束时加入您的行列。在此之后，愿帝皇保佑，相信这位监察官会为我洗清所有罪名，也相信小莱卡德的苦难终将结束。”
languages.original_text: "Then I will see you at the starport, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The master of ceremonies will organise the procession in a way that should allow me share the ceremony's finale with you. And after that, Emperor willing, the Proctor will clear me of all charges, and the woes of Rykad Minoris will be over at last."

traits.locale_text: “既然如此，我们就在星港见吧，大人。祭仪大师会组织好游行队伍，而我会在庆典即将结束时加入您的行列。在此之后，愿帝皇保佑，相信这位监察官会为我洗清所有罪名，也相信小莱卡德的苦难终将结束。”

languages.text: 「では、スターポートで会いましょう。式典の進行役が配慮してくれたおかげで、私も式の終わりをあなたと共に迎えられる予定です。その後、皇帝のご加護があれば、代理人が私の嫌疑をすべて晴らし、ライカド・ミノリスの苦難もついに終わることでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Then I will see you at the starport, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The master of ceremonies will organise the procession in a way that should allow me share the ceremony's finale with you. And after that, Emperor willing, the Proctor will clear me of all charges, and the woes of Rykad Minoris will be over at last."

traits.locale_text: 「では、スターポートで会いましょう。式典の進行役が配慮してくれたおかげで、私も式の終わりをあなたと共に迎えられる予定です。その後、皇帝のご加護があれば、代理人が私の嫌疑をすべて晴らし、ライカド・ミノリスの苦難もついに終わることでしょう」

languages.text: "O hâlde yıldız limanında görüşmek üzere {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Teşrifatçı, törenin sonunu sizinle paylaşmama müsaade edecek şekilde bir organizasyon tertip edecek. İmparator nasip ederse ardından Üsteğmen, üzerimdeki tüm suçlamaları kaldıracak ve Rykad Minoris'in kederleri en nihayetinde son bulacak."
languages.original_text: "Then I will see you at the starport, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The master of ceremonies will organise the procession in a way that should allow me share the ceremony's finale with you. And after that, Emperor willing, the Proctor will clear me of all charges, and the woes of Rykad Minoris will be over at last."

traits.locale_text: "O hâlde yıldız limanında görüşmek üzere {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Teşrifatçı, törenin sonunu sizinle paylaşmama müsaade edecek şekilde bir organizasyon tertip edecek. İmparator nasip ederse ardından Üsteğmen, üzerimdeki tüm suçlamaları kaldıracak ve Rykad Minoris'in kederleri en nihayetinde son bulacak."
